mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT(CHAT_NUM, STU_NUM, CHAT_CONT, CHAT_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_CHAT.NEXTVAL, #{stuNum}, #{chatCont}, SYSDATE)
